summary: Senior educational administrator with extensive experience as a middle school principal, focused on expanding administrative capabilities, building positive relationships and transparent leadership, and driving student achievement through data-driven instruction and professional development.

experience.title: Middle School Principal
experience.description: Supervised and evaluated certified and non-certified staff; implemented a pilot staff evaluation model; oversaw general and special education staff and ensured compliance with IEP/504/Title I and at-risk services; planned and implemented book studies and professional development; mentored staff, led school improvement teams, and facilitated data-driven instructional decisions; maintained parent communication and supervised athletic programs; facilitated Title I audits and mediated student issues; contributed to Administrative Team and designed differentiated instruction.

experience.title: Assistant Middle School Principal
experience.description: Evaluated certified and non-certified staff; supervised extracurricular activities; supported transitions between grades; assisted in planning school improvement and professional development; supervised special education teachers; educated students and families on academic and behavioral expectations; managed disciplinary issues and fostered district-wide positive relationships; delivered professional development for district bus drivers to support safe transportation.

experience.title: High School Language Arts Teacher; K-12 Career Preparation Coordinator; HS At-Risk Programming Coordinator; Freshmen Class Advisor
experience.description: Taught high school language arts; coordinated K-12 career preparation and at-risk programming; advised freshmen class; contributed to program development and student support initiatives.

experience.title: Student Government Advisor; School Improvement Team Committee Chairperson; OEA Negotiating Team member
experience.description: Advised student government; chaired School Improvement Team; participated in OEA negotiating team; supported school-wide improvement and staff collaboration.

education.degree: Master of Arts in Educational Leadership
Bachelor of Arts in English and Psychology
Secondary Teaching Certificate in English and Psychology

certifications: The Thoughtful Classroom Teacher Evaluation System
MCEE pilot program with University of Michigan
Principals' NCLB and Title I Boot Camp
Reading Apprenticeship: Rethinking Secondary Literacy Strategies
